IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: IT IS THE MISSION OF MOUNTAIN COMPREHENSIVE CARE CENTER TO PROVIDE ACCESS TO A COMPREHENSIVE ARRAY OF HIGH QUALITY SERVICES THAT WILL RESULT IN SUCCESS AND SATISFACTION FOR CUSTOMERS, THE COMPANY, AND THE COMMUNITY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: IT IS THE MISSION OF MOUNTAIN COMPREHENSIVE CARE CENTER TO PROVIDE ACCESS TO A COMPREHENSIVE ARRAY OF HIGH QUALITY SERVICES THAT WILL RESULT IN SUCCESS AND SATISFACTION FOR CUSTOMERS, THE COMPANY, AND THE COMMUNITY.
IRS990.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES MENTAL HEALTH-MENTAL RETARDATION AND DRUG AND ALCOHOL REHABILITATION SERVICES.

ContractorCompensationGrp.ServicesDesc: EVALUATION SERVICES, RESEARCH AND DATA C

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MOUNTAIN IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAXES AS AN ORGANIZATION DESCRIBED UNDER 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND SECTION 141.010(1)(F) OF THE KENTUCKY REVISED STATUTES. MOUNTAIN HAD NO UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME FOR THE FISCAL YEARS ENDED JUNE 30, 2018 AND 2017. MOUNTAIN'S OPEN AUDIT PERIODS ARE FISCAL YEARS ENDED JUNE 30, 2015 THROUGH 2017.
COST OF SALE REPORTED NET ON FORM 990 175,532.
COST OF SALES REPORTED NET ON FORM 990 175,532.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS SIGNED BY THE CFO, AND IS PRESENTED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR REVIEW AT THE NEXT BOARD MEETING. COMPENSATION OF THE FIVE HIGHEST PAID EMPLOYEES IS OMITTED FROM THE FORM 990 REVIEW DUE TO THE MEETING BEING AN OPEN MEETING WITH STAFF AND OTHER PERSONS IN ATTENDANCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL STAFF AND BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO REPORT ALL RELATIONSHIPS WITH CLIENTS. ANY RELATIONSHIP IS REVIEWED THE IMMEDIATE SUPERVISOR, PROGRAM DIRECTOR AND EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR. STAFF WHO KNOWLINGLY ENGAGE IN A RELATIONSHIP THAT IS AGAINST POLICY ARE SUBJECT TO DISCIPLINARY ACTION UP TO AND INCLUDING TERMINATION OF EMPLOYMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEW AND APPROVES THE CEO'S SALARY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
PURCHASED SERVICES: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 40,253,150. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 4,467,603. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 0. TOTAL EXPENSES 44,720,753.
THE AUDIT PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
